name: OldPuzzles
description: A science fiction-theme puzzle. Each level consists of 12 elements that will need to be rotated so that they match all the elements. The game has 15 levels. With each level, the pictures become a little more complicated. If you are in a difficult situation, then click on the E button, and the game will tell you where to place the desired item. In the game, you can scroll through the levels without pressing them, if they could difficulties in passing, just press the left arrow. The game will delight you with nice graphics and calm music.
